name: Hyper Drift
description:
BASIC INFO:

Racing at speeds over 800 kilometers per hour! This is a demo prototype for a high speed anti-gravity racing game. Inspired by titles such as F-Zero and Wipeout. Because this is a prototype there is only time attack mode and two tracks to race on.

I'm still a new Unity developer so there may be some bugs in this project but it mostly runs smoothly. As I get better at development and build my skills up, I will work more on this project to flesh out a full game. If any Unity devs out there enjoy this project and want to collaborate in the future, you can contact me via email here: dustsoft@gmail.com



For now I'll be moving on to another project so I can learn more and get better at development. Thanks again for playing this game!
